Detailed Description

This class handles receiving information and turning it into a plist xml buffer. The buffer can be used to output or send to Orca.

Usage:

    ORXmlPlistString aString;
    aString.LoadDictionary( someORDictionary );
    
    std::cout << aString << std::endl;  // Print out string
    ...
    aString.Reset();
    aString.LoadDictionary( someOtherORDictionary );

Constructor. Here one can pass a guess at the length, so that one can limit reallocation of memory.
